product_name: America the Beautiful National Parks Pass - 2014/2015
long_description: Granting free admission to national parks, the 2014/2015 America the Beautiful National Parks pass lets you enjoy our country's natural beauty and grandeur. At any national park with an entrance fee, your pass admits you and any passengers in your private vehicle. At national parks with a per-person admission fee, your pass admits you and 3 accompanying adults age 16 and older. Covers park admission only; does not cover Expanded Amenity or Concessionaire fees such as parking, RV hookups, camping, shuttles, boat launches and guided interpretive tours. Pass is valid for 1 year from the month of purchase. More than 80% of pass proceeds go straight into vital park programs to protect and improve our national treasures. Pass is honored at sites managed by the Forest Service, National Park Service, Fish and Wildlife Service, Bureau of Land Management and Bureau of Reclamation. National Parks Pass is non-transferable and non-refundable;.
short_description: Granting free admission to national parks, the 2014/2015 America the Beautiful National Parks pass lets you enjoy our country's natural beauty and grandeur.
